reviews.review:
Топовая игрулька без скинов и прочего доната!
Topovaya igrulka, bez skinov i prochego donata!

The best Source port Valve has managed to do. The bhopping is pretty magnificent (I mean look at phoon! Although, that was back in 2008 or so before the bhop patch). The graphics and sound in all is pretty damn good for 2004. The level design has a lot of detail and the maps are incredible for PUGs or just fucking around with friends (or bots). Best part about this game is that it isn't ruined by micro transactions. You want a skin? Download one from GameBanana free of charge. The servers are still pretty active and there are some decent people on here. Met a guy on here who ended up becoming my best mate. 

The negatives of the game are the hitboxes. The enormous hitboxes. Headshots are so easy to get even with a deagle. And my aim isn't even really that good.
延续了老一代的CS起源  喜欢经典的玩家值得入手玩一玩

Great game :D u have to may more for the Vintage Version cause if u buy CSgo u r not buyiing the real deal buy cssource and maybe just maybe u will get laid who knows.

Good game. I enjoy it more than its newer counterpart Counter-Strike: Global Offensive

Лучше чем CS:GO.
CS:S - это когда можно спреить с дигла и попадать в цель.
CS:S - это когда стреляешь во время серфа и попадаешь.
CS:S - это не симулятор скинов.
CS:S - это старые добрые звуки и оружия.
CS:S - это не бесплатное говно, как CS:GO.
这真的好玩，虽然已经很老了。

之前一直在玩盗版很长时间，现在入正也算是回味经典吧

[spoiler]入正还有个原因是因为我家机子玩箱子GO帧数太低只有不到15帧。实在是玩不下去了QAQ......[/spoiler]
It's a great game, but I couldn’t find the stupid cake.

Büyük bir değişimle gelen CS'nin büyük kitlelere ulaşmış efsane oyunu. İlk zamanlarda gelen değişiklikler eskiye alışmış olanlar için çok farklı gelse de zamanla herkes alıştı ve sevdi. Yeni map ve silah tasarımları,daha geliştirilmiş server ve hile koruma sistemleri,tamamen yenilenmiş bir CS oyunu. Sonuna kadar oynanmayı hak eden bir oyun. 9/10

Пожалуй, лучшая игра серии. Знакомство с CS у меня началось именно с этой игры. На данный момент, конечно, уступает по графике и интерфейсу CS:GO, но положительных эмоций от этой игры у меня осталось гораздо больше, нежели как раз того же GO.

Ho nostalgia della 1.5 \ 1.6, veri e propri capolavori che mi hanno regalato momenti incredibili... ma nostalgia a parte, riconosco che CS:S è un seguito dannatamente buono, migliorato sotto molti punti di vista senza snaturare il gioco e le mappe come invece si potrebbe obiettare a CS:GO.

E' ancora il mio sparatutto preferito, senza ombra di dubbio.
什么东西，直接闪退，客服也不解决
pretty good for mini game like ttt and surfing and bhoping.

Ich habe 5 Jahre meines lebens in CSS verbracht...ich idiot!

Und durch diese 68 Stunden finde ich es schwer etwas neues zu erlernen , und an der HAnd genommen zu werden, als hätte ich NULL Ahnung, finde ich einfach bescheuert!
Tut mir leid, aber hier wurde eine Generation für eine neue ausgetauscht!
Habt Spass mit dem Spiel, al hail to the gabben...
Aber hier und jetzt ist SCHADE weil verrückt! 

PS: TOTE SIND LÄNGER TOT!
